trans-unit.source: Represents an ordered pair of integer x- and y-coordinates that defines a point in a two-dimensional plane.
trans-unit.target: Representa um par ordenado de coordenadas x e y de inteiros que define um ponto em um plano bidimensional.

trans-unit.source: To convert a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> to a <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Implicit%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para converter um <xref:System.Drawing.Point> para um <xref:System.Drawing.PointF>, use <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Implicit%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates points and sizes using several of the overloaded operators defined for these types.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria pontos e tamanhos usando vários dos operadores sobrecarregados definidos para esses tipos.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> class.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `subtractButton`.
trans-unit.target: Criar um formulário que contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> chamado `subtractButton`.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and call the `CreatePointsAndSizes` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código para o formulário e chamar o `CreatePointsAndSizes` método do formulário de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> método de manipulação de eventos, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> class with the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> com as coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the coordinates for the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que especifica as coordenadas para o novo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> class from a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> de um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operator and how to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> from a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> or two integers.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operador e como construir um <xref:System.Drawing.Point> de um <xref:System.Drawing.Size> ou dois inteiros.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código em um formulário que contém um botão chamado `Button1`e associe o `Button1_Click` método com o botão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit integer that specifies the coordinates for the new <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Um inteiro de 32 bits que especifica as coordenadas para o novo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> class using coordinates specified by an integer value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> usando coordenadas especificadas por um valor inteiro.

trans-unit.source: The low-order 16 bits of the `dw` parameter specify the horizontal x-coordinate and the higher 16 bits specify the vertical y-coordinate for the new <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.
trans-unit.target: Os 16 bits de ordem inferior do `dw` parâmetro especifique a coordenada x horizontal e os 16 bits superior a coordenada y vertical para o novo <xref:System.Drawing.Point>.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> constructors and the <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.%23ctor%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.%23ctor%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> construtores e <xref:System.Drawing.ContentAlignment?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a Windows Form that contains a label named `Label1`, and call the `IntializeLabel1` method in the form's constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole este código em um formulário do Windows que contenha um rótulo chamado `Label1`e chamar o `IntializeLabel1` método no construtor do formulário.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal position of the point.
trans-unit.target: A posição horizontal do ponto.

trans-unit.source: The vertical position of the point.
trans-unit.target: A posição vertical do ponto.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> class with the specified coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> com as coordenadas especificadas.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operator and how to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> from a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> or two integers.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operador e como construir um <xref:System.Drawing.Point> de um <xref:System.Drawing.Size> ou dois inteiros.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código em um formulário que contém um botão chamado `Button1`e associe o `Button1_Click` método com o botão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> to add
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> a ser adicionado

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> especificado no <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that is the result of the addition operation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que é o resultado da operação de adição.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Add%2A> adds the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Size> to the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of the specified point.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Add%2A> adiciona o <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> especificada <xref:System.Drawing.Size> para o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> valores de ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Add%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole-o em um formulário do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `AddPoint` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Controlar o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos e chamadas de `AddPoint` método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> método de manipulação de eventos, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by rounding the values of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to the next higher integer values.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> especificado em um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> arredondando os valores do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> para os valores de inteiro mais próximos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> no qual este método se converte.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that has <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> values set to zero.
trans-unit.target: Representa um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que tem valores <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> definidos como zero.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Object" /> to test.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Object" /> a ser testado.

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> contains the same coordinates as the specified <see cref="T:System.Object" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> contém as mesmas coordenadas que o <see cref="T:System.Object" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="obj" /> is a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> and has the same coordinates as this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="obj" /> for um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> e tiver as mesmas coordenadas que este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um código hash para este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: An integer value that specifies a hash value for this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Um valor inteiro que especifica um valor de hash para este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: You should avoid depending on <xref:System.Drawing.Point.GetHashCode%2A> for unique values, as two <xref:System.Drawing.Point> objects with the same values for their <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties may return the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: Você deve evitar dependendo <xref:System.Drawing.Point.GetHashCode%2A> de valores exclusivos, como dois <xref:System.Drawing.Point> objetos com os mesmos valores para seus <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> propriedades podem retornar o mesmo código de hash.

trans-unit.source: This behavior could change in a future release.
trans-unit.target: Esse comportamento foi alterado em uma versão futura.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> is empty.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> está vazio.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> are 0; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se tanto <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> quanto <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> forem 0; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Translates the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> pelo valor especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> used offset this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: O deslocamento <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> usado por esse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Translates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte esse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> pelo <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This method adjusts the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of this <xref:System.Drawing.Point> to the sum of the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of this <xref:System.Drawing.Point> and `p`.
trans-unit.target: Este método ajusta o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> valores deste <xref:System.Drawing.Point> a soma da <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> valores deste <xref:System.Drawing.Point> e `p`.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Offset%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o método <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Offset%2A>.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole-o em um formulário do Windows.

trans-unit.source: Handle the form’s <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `OffsetPoint` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Controlar o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos e chamadas de `OffsetPoint` método do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> método de manipulação de eventos, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset the x-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade para deslocar a coordenada X.

trans-unit.source: The amount to offset the y-coordinate.
trans-unit.target: A quantidade para deslocar a coordenada Y.

trans-unit.source: Translates this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by the specified amount.
trans-unit.target: Converte esse <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> pela quantidade especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the pair of numbers to add to the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que especifica o par de números a adicionar às coordenadas do <c>pt</c>.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Move um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> por um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> determinado.

trans-unit.source: The translated <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> movido.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates points and sizes using several of the overloaded operators defined for these types.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria pontos e tamanhos usando vários dos operadores sobrecarregados definidos para esses tipos.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> class.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `subtractButton`.
trans-unit.target: Criar um formulário que contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> chamado `subtractButton`.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and call the `CreatePointsAndSizes` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código para o formulário e chamar o `CreatePointsAndSizes` método do formulário de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> método de manipulação de eventos, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The result specifies whether the values of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> properties of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> objects are equal.
trans-unit.target: O resultado especifica se os valores das propriedades <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> dos dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> and <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> values of <paramref name="left" /> and <paramref name="right" /> are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os valores <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> e <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> de <paramref name="left" /> e <paramref name="right" /> forem iguais; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operator and how to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> from a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> or two integers.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operador e como construir um <xref:System.Drawing.Point> de um <xref:System.Drawing.Size> ou dois inteiros.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código em um formulário que contém um botão chamado `Button1`e associe o `Button1_Click` método com o botão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Converte a estrutura especificada <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that results from the conversion.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que resulta da conversão.

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates points and sizes using several of the overloaded operators defined for these types.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir cria pontos e tamanhos usando vários dos operadores sobrecarregados definidos para esses tipos.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> class.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.SystemPens> classe.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Create a form that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> named `subtractButton`.
trans-unit.target: Criar um formulário que contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Button> chamado `subtractButton`.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into the form and call the `CreatePointsAndSizes` method from the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código para o formulário e chamar o `CreatePointsAndSizes` método do formulário de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> método de manipulação de eventos, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to be converted.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Converte a estrutura especificada <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> em uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> that results from the conversion.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> que resulta da conversão.

trans-unit.source: The following code example adds a shadow to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> using overloaded operators.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir adiciona uma sombra em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> usando sobrecarga dos operadores.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with a Windows Form.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com um Windows Form.

trans-unit.source: To run this example, paste this code into a form and call the `AddShadow` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Para executar este exemplo, cole este código em um formulário e a chamada a `AddShadow` método ao lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Be sure that the form contains a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> named `listBox1`.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que o formulário contém um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListBox> chamado `listBox1`.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: Compares two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Compara dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The result specifies whether the values of the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> or <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> properties of the two <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> objects are unequal.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o resultado se os valores das propriedades <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> dos dois objetos <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> são diferentes.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the values of either the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> properties or the <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> properties of <paramref name="left" /> and <paramref name="right" /> differ; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se os valores das propriedades <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.X" /> ou <see cref="P:System.Drawing.Point.Y" /> de <paramref name="left" /> e <paramref name="right" /> forem diferentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to translate.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> a ser movido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> that specifies the pair of numbers to subtract from the coordinates of <c>pt</c>.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> que especifica o par de números para subtrair de coordenadas de <c>pt</c>.

trans-unit.source: Translates a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by the negative of a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> pelo negativo de um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> structure that is translated by the negative of a given <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> structure.
trans-unit.target: Uma estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> é convertida pelo negativo de uma determinada estrutura <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.PointConverter> and the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Subtraction%2A> operator.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.PointConverter> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Subtraction%2A> operador.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Paste this code into a form and call the `ShowPointConverter` method when handling the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: Cole este código em um formulário e a chamada a `ShowPointConverter` método ao lidar com o formulário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> evento, passando `e` como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> object by rounding the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> values to the nearest integer.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> especificado em um objeto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />, arredondando os valores <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> para o inteiro mais próximo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> no qual este método se converte.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to be subtracted from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> do qual subtrair.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> to subtract from the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> a subtrair do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of subtracting specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> from the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o resultado da subtração do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> especificado do <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> that is the result of the subtraction operation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> que é o resultado da operação de subtração.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Subtract%2A> subtracts the <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> of the specified <xref:System.Drawing.Size> from the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> values of the specified point.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Subtract%2A> subtrai o <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Width%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Size.Height%2A> especificada <xref:System.Drawing.Size> do <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> valores de ponto especificado.

trans-unit.source: Converts this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> to a human-readable string.
trans-unit.target: Converte este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> em uma cadeia de caracteres legível por humanos.

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que representa este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to convert.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> by truncating the values of the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.PointF" /> especificado em um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> truncando os valores de <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> this method converts to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" /> no qual este método se converte.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada X este <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada X deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operator and how to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> from a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> or two integers.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operador e como construir um <xref:System.Drawing.Point> de um <xref:System.Drawing.Size> ou dois inteiros.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código em um formulário que contém um botão chamado `Button1`e associe o `Button1_Click` método com o botão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coordenada Y deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of this <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.
trans-unit.target: A coordenada Y deste <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Point" />.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operator and how to construct a <xref:System.Drawing.Point> from a <xref:System.Drawing.Size> or two integers.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.op_Equality%2A> operador e como construir um <xref:System.Drawing.Point> de um <xref:System.Drawing.Size> ou dois inteiros.

trans-unit.source: It also demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Ele também demonstra como usar o <xref:System.Drawing.Point.X%2A> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point.Y%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é projetado para ser usado com o Windows Forms.

trans-unit.source: Paste the code into a form that contains a button named `Button1`, and associate the `Button1_Click` method with the button's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Cole o código em um formulário que contém um botão chamado `Button1`e associe o `Button1_Click` método com o botão <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> eventos.
